channel.title: Tavlonia is back!
channel.description:
Tavlonia Link: http://tavlonia.biz/
Tavlonia is a spawn/pk server soon we adding a eco world we just need some donations.
-Perfect pking -no lagg -online 24/7 hosted with vps -good switching -pk shop -::master
here is some picures on pk world:
Pk shop [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1211.hizliresim.com/13/x/gdh9c.png[/img][/url]
Donator shop [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1211.hizliresim.com/13/x/gdhbp.png[/img][/url]
::mage for mage gear [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://b1211.hizliresim.com/13/x/gdhcv.png[/img][/url]
::range for range gear [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://d1211.hizliresim.com/13/x/gdhdh.png[/img][/url]
::melee for melee gear [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://d1211.hizliresim.com/13/x/gdhf1.png[/img][/url]
::commands [url=http://bit.ly/c25MCx][img]http://d1211.hizliresim.com/13/x/gdhfp.png[/img][/url]
play game here: http://tavlonia.biz/
